title: Banned
body: Kay so to start this off, I'm not asking for an unban or anything and Idk if this is where this goes or not but yeah. My ban was well deserved one of my teammates was being toxic and I had assumed he was just joking cause I was doing fairly well that game and we were winning hard, so I joined in and said some offensive stuff ASSUMING we were just joking around and again it was a well deserved ban I'm fine with waiting it out. However I'm curious will I still get my seasonal rewards for hitting gold like my border and victorious skin? First season hitting gold and I'd be pretty disappointed if I didn't get my rewards off of a game I was joking around in.. Anyways thank you in advance!

replies.body: Typically, anyone who is given a ban lasting 7 or more days (taking place within 3 months of the season's end) will be ineligible for the season rewards. With that being said, we haven't fully released the 2017 season rewards quite yet so be on the lookout for those details!

> [{quoted}](name=Broporo,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=mKKT6Hpg,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2017-07-07T03:12:42.969+0000)

> Typically, anyone who is given a ban lasting 7 or more days (taking place within 3 months of the season's end) will be ineligible for the season rewards. With that being said, we haven't fully released the 2017 season rewards quite yet so be on the lookout for those details!

So do you think I have a chance? This is kinda depressing since I was only joking

The end of the season hasn't been announced quite yet, and I believe the date for that 3 month window was Aug 7th last year, so you should be alright if you don't get any punishments from now until the end of the season!
